snippet: The Belarussian champion Yauheni Hutarovich won the first stage of the Tour of Poland after 226 kilometers, about 140 miles, from Gdansk to Bydgoszcz in a sprint finish.
abstract: Yauheni Hutarovich wins first stage of Tour of Poland bicycle race.
lead_paragraph: The Belarussian champion Yauheni Hutarovich won the first stage of the Tour of Poland after 226 kilometers, about 140 miles, from Gdansk to Bydgoszcz in a sprint finish.

headline.main: Belarussian Wins Tour of Poland’s First Stage
headline.print_headline: Belarussian Wins Tour of Poland’s First Stage
